sentences.english: The trip west was hard. Many of the people died.
sentences.chinese: 這次西行的旅程非常艱苦，許多人死在了路上。

sentences.english: Certainly, the government itself is not about to start making a fetish of frugality.
sentences.chinese: 當然政府自身不打算做艱苦樸素的榜樣。

sentences.english: After tough training, I got rid of my self-abasement and became confident.
sentences.chinese: 經過艱苦的訓練，使我增強了自信心，消除了自卑感。

sentences.english: The hard fut battle for recognition has been won, but it is by no means over.
sentences.chinese: 這場艱苦的女性能力認可戰雖已打贏，卻遠未終結。

sentences.english: Life was much larder in the aftermath of the war.
sentences.chinese: 生活在戰爭的後續狀況中更艱苦。

sentences.english: After ten years of careful preparations, he attacked and finally conquered the State of Wu.
sentences.chinese: 經過十年艱苦奮鬥，越過終於雪恥戰勝吳國。

sentences.english: We should carry through the principle of plain living and hard struggle.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥的精神要貫徹始終。

sentences.english: The most important thing is to adapt all kinds of hard environment and labor ability exercise through labor.
sentences.chinese: 但最根本的是適應各種艱苦環境和勞動能力的鍛鍊。

sentences.english: He suffered from a collapse of the body after long days of hard work.
sentences.chinese: 由於許多天長時間的艱苦工作他累倒了。

sentences.english: Mr. Shi applauds the government's hard work.
sentences.chinese: 石先生讚許政府的艱苦工作。

sentences.english: If you go camping you'll have to rough it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去參加野營，你就得過艱苦簡陋的生活。

sentences.english: I have had my labor for my travail .
sentences.chinese: 我已把自己勞動奉獻給艱苦的工作。

sentences.english: Dazhai are representative of one of hard work.
sentences.chinese: 是大寨艱苦創業的代表人物之一。

sentences.english: It was hard work, but everybody went at it with a will.
sentences.chinese: 勞動很艱苦，可是大家幹勁十足。

sentences.english: Hard work is rewarding And three years later, we me again.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥是值得的，三年後我們又相遇了。

sentences.english: The spirit of arduous struggle is a social-historical category.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥精神是一個社會歷史範疇。

definition: firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
